post.body: Ilike it and say you keep it until... hmm the 10th of January at least.
- also called the beehive. http://bit.ly/2aT0
I like your "quote of the day" have you checked out http://overheard.it to share them with more people.
although I am just about to head out to a meeting - after that gonna finish the shopping on Christmas Eve in true man style.
I happily wasn't but my phone was and boinged at me.
congratulations on the award.
Happy New Year!
Costco, new years eve. Bad idea
Another two hours of my life given to trying to get Datatel's CMS to stop hanging on me.
Just got back from a day in the snow, no email, no phone, no twitter. Feeling chilled.
I've had way too much coffee. I've spent the last 3 hrs in starbucks waiting for the car repairs to be finished.
Shoot - my BB is almost out of juice.
at the mechanics getting brakes done before heading to the snow tomorrow.
Cleaning up after the second cook fest in 3 days. Indian Food again! And a shepherd's pie for the less adventurous.
Wee man - I'm pretty sure you're not supposed to climb the bookshelves to put a book back . Resourceful though.
The boy has been inspirational for two of his friends . Three 10 yr olds volunteering at the library, heart warming & entertaining to watch.
chillin at the library with the wee-uns.
Now that makes more sense. He said Laker fan. Not liquor fan. I was confused
Of course the web server at work goes down on Christmas Eve!
the boy is finally asleep!
